NUVEM_DESCRI: Do not miss your maps. Using CMPaaS you will have access to your maps wherever and whenever you want.
OPENSOURCE_DESCRI: Our project is completely open-source. You can use our api's freely in your projects and integrate them into the CMPaaS.
REDESOCIAL_DESCRI: You can use our services to interact with the mapping community, build collaborative maps, access and publish your maps for surveys across our network.
